parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Annotation type as defined by swAnnotationType_e (see Remarks )

title: IModelDocExtension.GetAnnotationsByType
description: Gets the annotations of the specified type in this document.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Annotation type as defined by swAnnotationType_e (see Remarks )

remarks: This method does not support swAnnotationType_e.swCThread for parts and assemblies, because in those models cosmetic threads are added as sub-features of holes, not annotations.
